title: Strong Sense of What You Like
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Ruby, I tried wearing it. How do I look?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Waaah~! You look beautiful, Ruby knew that it would fit you. The mermaid style one piece is usually very mature, but it also has this cuteness thanks to the floral pattern.... It’s perfect for you, Eli-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thank you. Hearing you say that gives me confidence, Ruby.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah, Ruby thinks it’s really nice. This material is breezy and perfect for summer. It helps bring out more of your cool charms, Eli-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Geez, if you keep praising me that much, I’m going to be embarrassed.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>But you do look beautiful! It’s amazing how you can wear it so perfectly, Eli-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, I’m happy to hear that. But you’re the amazing one, Ruby. You must have a really keen eye for fashion to pick clothes that fit people perfectly like this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Pigii! Ruby doesn’t have anything like that....! Ruby does love fashion, but.... Ruby just felt that Ruby wants to see you in this one, or something like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That “I want to see you in this” feeling is probably a sign that you’re developing your fashion sense. Wouldn’t you say so, Ruby? Besides, it is thanks to you that I got to find this beautiful one piece, so you don’t have to be so modest, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>....Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
